# 前端图形js库
- [带标记的折现图](https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/editor.html?c=line-marker&lang=js)
- [动态变化的折现图](https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/editor.html?c=line-race)
- [JSON文件格式](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#dataset.source)
- [echarts教程](https://www.runoob.com/echarts/echarts-tutorial.html)
